With the advent of decentralized infrastructure and blockchain technology, we believe there is a strong need to foresee and build solutions for blockchain startups, companies, and communities alike.

Products & Services

Ecosystem

We are primarily working on the Cosmos community and we have our contributions to the Ethereum community as well. We offer Staking Infrastructure Service, Blockchain Research and Development service, Strategy and Execution of main net & test net launch, Monitoring and Alert Tools along with our own block explorer called Aneka.io.

Partners & Words

"Vitwit is more than just a core contributor to the Cosmos SDK, and Regen Ledger. They are a foundational community member of Regen Network and the broader Cosmos Ecosystem. They have been a pleasure to work with from day one. Overdelivering, under-promising and always being willing to go the extra mile."
Gregory Landua
CEO RND Inc, and co-founder of Regen Network

Co-founder & CEO of Akash Network
"Spl. thanks to our friends at @vitwit_ / WitVal, who deployed @aneka_io for OmniFlix! FlixNet-2 saw a lot: - 200+ validators bootstrap a chain in 1min - patch to fix the mismatch of IBC versions - high storage consumption & the best is yet to come!"
OmniFlix Network
